name: Forte Hackathon Core
description: GitLab merge request automation that validates webhook events, runs multi-agent reviews, and posts structured comments back to GitLab.
architecture: FastAPI endpoint /gitlab/webhook validates secrets and schedules background work.
WebhookProcessor loads merge request metadata via GitLabService.
Agentic reviewer orchestrates specialized agents (task summary, code summary, naming, tests, diagrams) with a shared LLM.
Results are posted as separate GitLab discussion notes.
testing_standards: Add focused pytest coverage for new endpoints, service logic, and edge cases. Prefer unit tests over integration unless external APIs are required.
coding_guidelines: Follow PEP8, avoid mutable default args, keep modules cohesive, and use descriptive function/class names.
